org.jgrapes.util.events

Class ConfigurationUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBase<T>
      • org.jgrapes.core.Event<Void>
        • org.jgrapes.util.events.ConfigurationUpdate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Future<Void>, Associator, Eligible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InitialPreferences

    public class ConfigurationUpdate
extends Event<Void>

    An event to indicate that configuration information has been updated.

    Configurability based on this type of event can optionally be supported by components. If supported, a component implements a handler that checks whether the paths of this event include the component’s path in the application’s component tree (see Manager.path()). If so, the component adapts itself to the information propagated.
